#summary desknfc - Downloading, Installation and use

= Introduction =

Desknfc is a GUI which offer nfcd access through DBUS.
You can see Devices list, tag list, content list and open content.
Desknfc is written in C++, it use Qt. 

= Installation =

You need to have cmake and qt4 installed on your system.

Then, you can compile and use desknfc.

{{{
svn checkout http://nfc-tools.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/desknfc desknfc
cd deskfnc
mkdir build
cd build
cmake ..
make
su -c 'make install clean'
-> type your root password <-
}}}

Once these commands succeed, just launch nfcd, and type:
{{{
desknfc
}}}

You can also choose not to install desknfc, so just type "make" instead of "su -c 'make install'", and launch the desknfc binary which is in the build directory.

Nfcd is needed all along the execution of desknfc.
